alert.note: Alert for Adair; Putnam; Schuyler (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:23PM CDT until June 06 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Adair County in northeastern Missouri... Southeastern Putnam County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Schuyler County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 423 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Greencastle, or 13 miles southeast of Unionville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kirksville, Novinger, Greentop, Millard and Kirksville Regional. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
